cast.name: 迪米特里·格里特萨斯 Demetri Goritsas

introduction: A Curiosity Original Series. The universe is full of coded secrets — man-made enigmas hiding top-secret information, ancient wisdom lost in indecipherable languages, mysteries from space detected in strange radio waves. But despite their seemingly impregnable messages, genius cryptanalysts, spymasters, and self-taught crackers have unraveled some of these great mysteries. Cracking the Code reveals the greatest codes known to humanity and the brilliant minds that crack them.1. The Mob Code2. The Killer Code3. The Japanese Super Code4. The Lost Civilization5. The Gang Code6. The Cold War Code7. The Code That Won The Great War8. The Human Code
